Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.rounds

Class ActionRound

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.rounds.ActionRound
All Implemented Interfaces:
RoundInterface, Serializable
public class ActionRound extends Object implements RoundInterface, Serializable
Class used to represent the game's action round
